title: Original or copy
content:
Hi,

can anyone tell if this freeware font is the original thing or a copy of a “Pro” font

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [actionjackson.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=actionjackson.gif) | 1.64 KB |
author: Fonske

comments.content:
Freeware original.. from the font’s notes…

“Action Jackson Copyright (C) 1998 Tom Murphy - Free! But not to be resold (on CD for instance!)”

Thanks Wizard,

but ‘cause I’ve seen it a lot the last few months, I thougt there was an other similar font

‘ [Blockhead](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111165811/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PBloPl.html)’, _by John Hersey / Emigre, may be rather similar, but commercial_..  
_( Maybe you have seen that one, as well.? )_
